version_description: iOS 11 is here! Make sure you're all updated and squared away, there's good Lifesum stuff in the pipeline

Our quest to make the world healthier is ever ongoing, and day by day we keep making the app better. Sometimes it's baby steps, sometimes it's huge leaps. Either way, it's all in the game.

If you have any questions about the app, please drop us a line: contact@lifesum.com. Or if you think it's all awesome, we'd love a review in the App Store.

Stay golden!
Lifesum crew

We've done some work on the diary to give you more insights into your health journey. Now there's more details, more graphs, more colors, and it shows what diet plan you're on. In short, it's more you.

We hope you'll like it! If you have any questions, please drop us a line: contact@lifesum.com

Stay golden!
Lifesum crew

We've created a new 3-week program for effective weight loss. Pre-planned, easy to cook meals and shopping lists to go with them. We've done the thinking, you do the eating.
Oh, and we fixed a bug or two.

If you have any questions, please drop us a line: contact@lifesum.com

Stay golden!
Lifesum crew

Oh, and we fixed a bug or two.

If you have any questions, please drop us a line: contact@lifesum.com

Stay golden!
Lifesum crew
Stability improvements

For technical reasons, we will no longer support iOS9 or older. To download the latest version from the App Store, make sure your device is updated to at least iOS 10.

We've also moved the Friends tab to the Profile section. Let's hope nobody gets lost ;)

Other than that we've been doing general maintenance, polishing and bug fixing.

Stay golden!
Lifesum

The war on bugs continues in this fresh version of Lifesum! In this release, you can expect the following changes.

- There was a small crash when chaining servings of favourited recipes, this has now been fixed!

Questions, comments or musings? Don’t be a stranger!
contact@lifesum.com

Happy health,

Lifesum

Lifesummers: they’re here! In one of our most exciting updates yet, we’re officially launching not one but THREE new Meal Plans satisfying the tastes of Vegan and Keto fans alike as well as a brand new experience for our Meal Plans section. Included in this release:
- Keto plans - lose or maintain weight keto-style
- Vegan for a Week highlights tasty ways to eat Green (and tick ‘Delicious’ boxes as well!)
- Great new look and feel to our Meal Plan section

Additionally, we've fixed some nutrition & weight sync issues between Lifesum and the Health app.

The war on bugs continues in this fresh version of Lifesum! In this release, you can expect the following changes.

- Some users were experiencing a UI bug which caused the log in screen to show at times it shouldn't, consider it fixed.
- A bug where future meals were not shown in the meal planner has been tracked down and eradicated, plan on!
- Progress has been made on discovering new taste dimensions
- All around stability and improvements can also be expected throughout the app

Questions, comments or musings? Don’t be a stranger!
contact@lifesum.com

Happy health,

Lifesum

Tech is an interesting learning environment. For everyone. Even us here at Lifesum. And this release, we've learned how to fix the following things:

The favourites button on food items became hard to see for a little while, favourite away!
Improvements made to 3rd party connections (now it’s a REAL party)
A range of stability and stability fixes (solid as a rock, baby!)

Questions, comments or musings? Don’t be a stranger!
contact@lifesum.com

Peace, love and groovy stuff

Lifesum
We're glad to inform you, for this update we've...well, we've been focusing on maintenance and bug fixing. We sure hope you'll notice how smoothly the app runs now!

For technical reasons, we will no longer support iOS9 or older. To download the latest version from the App Store, make sure your device is updated to at least iOS 10.

We've also moved the Friends tab to the Profile section. Let's hope nobody gets lost ;)

Other than that we've been doing general maintenance, polishing and bug fixing.

Stay golden!
Lifesum
We thought we'd show some love to the ketogenic tribe out there. We now support net carbs on the keto/lchf diets, and you can also edit your macronutrients on all diets. Have fun kids!
We're glad to inform you, for this update we've...well, we've been focusing on maintenance and bug fixing. We sure hope you'll notice how smoothly the app runs now!

Our quest to make the world healthier is ever ongoing, and day by day we keep making the app better. Sometimes it's baby steps, sometimes it's huge leaps. Either way, it's all in the game.

If you have any questions about the app, please drop us a line: contact@lifesum.com. Or if you think it's all awesome, we'd love a review in the App Store.

Stay golden!
Lifesum crew

Lifesum crew

We've been pretty busy these last few weeks, and now we're finally ready to reveal our latest feature; a 'lil something called GDPR Compliance. Seriously though, while it may not be the hottest thing ever built, it's really good for you. GDPR protects your user data and personal information and we're happy to comply with this new law.

Our quest to make the world healthier is ever ongoing, and day by day we keep making the app better. Sometimes it's baby steps, sometimes it's huge leaps. Either way, it's all in the game.
If you have any questions about the app, please drop us a line: contact@lifesum.com. Or if you think it's all awesome, we'd love a review in the App Store.

Stay golden! Lifesum crew
We've added a bunch of tasty new recipes for you to try out. Plus we've given the recipe tab in the app a little bit of design love. So get in there, get inspired, and get cooking!
We've added a bunch of tasty new recipes for you to try out. Plus we've given the recipe tab in the app a little bit of design love. So get in there, get inspired, and get cooking!

We've added a bunch of tasty new recipes for you to try out. Plus we've given the recipe tab in the app a little bit of design love. So get in there, get inspired, and get cooking!

And once again, our digital exterminators have been, well, exterminating and we’ve caught the following pesky critters:

* A few errant spelling errors
* The field validation when selecting a goal will now accept commas
* A permanent synchronization fail loop upon logging in: fixed!
* An issue where close buttons were missing in some parts of the app has been fixed
* An issue with calorie-to-kilojoule conversion has been fixed
* An issue where the diary date would jump to the current date upon putting the app in the background has been fixed

It’s all about making your journey to Health & Well-being as smooth as possible!

If you’ve got questions, we’ve got answers! Drop us a line at contact@lifesum.com. If you love our awesomeness, why not tell the whole world with a review in App Store :wink:
Stay golden!
Lifesum crew

Our Digital SWAT Squad have been sent in once more and neutralized the following troublesome bugs:

- A crash when importing manual Healthkit workouts crashes no more
- Bugs affecting Facebook logging in issues have been exterminated
- Premium banner communications have been corrected to reflect accurate information
- The Exclude Calories function in the Diary has been de-bugged and is working properly
- Hindrances to solving Einstein’s Theory of Everything - removed!

Stay Golden, people.
The Lifesum Crew.

Our Digital SWAT Squad have been sent in once more and neutralized the following troublesome bugs:
- A crash when importing manual Healthkit workouts crashes no more
- An additional critical crash has been fixed
- Bugs affecting Facebook logging in issues have been exterminated
- Premium banner communications have been corrected to reflect accurate information
- The Exclude Calories function in the Diary has been de-bugged and is working properly
- Hindrances to solving Einstein’s Theory of Everything - removed!

Stay Golden, people.
The Lifesum Crew.

- Hindrances to solving Einstein’s Theory of Everything - removed!

Stay Golden, people.
The Lifesum Crew.

Our Digital SWAT Squad have been sent in once more and neutralized the following troublesome bugs:
- A crash in the dairy details view has been fixed
- The layout on iPhone X is now smoother than ever
- Various smaller tweaks have been made all over the app

We hope you continue to have a fantastic week!
The Lifesum Crew.

Our SWAT team have been at it again and squished the following bothersome bugs:
- Small copy error in settings
- Healthkit weight import error
- Solved the mystery of life - it’s wild!

To go wherever the bugs may lead us - and squash them!

Stay groovy, Lifesum

We've breathed new life into the Lifesum Apple Watch app in the following ways:
- New summary view shows your calorie intake and helps you stay on top of nutrient distribution so you can keep track on the run (literally)
- Get an even quicker look at your nutrients with our all new complication for Apple Watch Series 4
- All round support for WatchOS 5

Also included in this update:
- Support for new iPhone XS and XS Max
- All round awesomeness, really.

We think you’ll enjoy this one!

Lifesum

We’ve added even more life into the Lifesum Apple Watch app,

Updated Apple Watch App:
Even more complications on more types of watch faces means you can macro on the go
Scroll-down main screen now shows individual meal ratings
Splashes of color have been added to make your progress clearer than ever

In the iOS App, it's all about stability:
The SWAT team terminated a few UI bugs on new iPhones
Then they got to work on general bug fixes and stability improvements.
Yep… they’ve been busy!

We’ve added even more life into the Lifesum Apple Watch app,
Updated Apple Watch App:
Even more complications on more types of watch faces means you can macro on the go
Scroll-down main screen now shows individual meal ratings
Splashes of color have been added to make your progress clearer than ever

Jack and Jill went up the hill and fetched the following fixes:

Lifesum Meal Plan shopping lists are now fully shareable, baby! NO excuses for not helping out, now!

Also in this release:
- A small bug in reset data has been squashed

We think you’re going to really dig it. Enjoy!

Peace out

Lifesum.

We didn’t use ANY sticky tape on the following fixes for you guys:

Wherever we encountered a bug...we terminated it!
A few handy little updates (see if you can spot them!) for increased awesomeness.
We’re also currently investigating a bit of a black hole in scientific research - what causes forgetting? This is one to remember!

We’re not satisfied until you are.

Stay Groovy,

Lifesum Crew

These fixes were kinda designed with you in mind...cause we kinda love you guys:
Magnus made short work of fixing a minor crash in the diary details - no one was injured and traffic is flowing again
Consider a Facebook connection issue: terminated.
The War on Bugs continues…

Until next time,

Lifesum

This update is for you, each and every one of you!
Magnus whipped up some speed and stability improvements
Great ground is being made in the War on Bugs
Until next time,

Lifesum

Speed. That’s what this release is all about. Not the kinda speed you barely notice and move on - hell no! We’re talking the kinda speed that sees Usain Bolt asking for tips; that makes Lewis Hamilton appear as though he hasn’t left second gear (think: triple shot espresso plus about 12 teaspoons of instant coffee. Yeah...THAT kinda speed).

Questions, comments or musings? We’d love to hear from you.
contact@lifesum.com

Speedily Yours,

The Lifesum Crew

Yeah...THAT kinda speed). Also included in this release:

Our recipes have a freshly updated look!

Questions, comments or musings? We’d love to hear from you.
contact@lifesum.com

Speedily Yours,

The Lifesum Crew

This fancy fix turned up on your digital doorstep courtesy of the keen eye of Kiki (she has two of them, of course, but it sounds weird to say ‘the keen eyes’...or, we thought so, anyway).

A minor crash when updating your weight in the diary has now been fixed!

Questions, comments or musings? Don’t be a stranger!
contact@lifesum.com

Peace, love and mungbeans

Lifesum

Keto plans - lose or maintain weight keto-style
Vegan for a Week highlights tasty ways to eat Green (and tick ‘Delicious’ boxes as well!)
Great new look and feel to our Meal Plan section

Who doesn’t love an update?! We’ve rebuilt an entire integration, squished a handful of bugs, and brought overall improvements throughout the app. Here are a few details:

- ALL your historical data for exercise, water tracker & habit trackers are now accessible - no matter how long ago you tracked it.
- Apple Health integration is now back on track and syncing better than ever (thank you for your patience, guys. We really appreciate it!)

Enjoy!

Lifesum

Enjoy!

Big news this release. We’ve been working on this day and night, and we’re excited to finally share it with you all:

In this release we're adding support for Voice control for further accessibility.
Apple’s bold new look can also be Lifesum’s bold new look - we’ve added support for Dark Mode.
In this update we’ve also add support for Sign In With Apple, check it out!

It’s all in the name of better health for you.

Stay Groovy,
Lifesum Crew

A fresh version of Lifesum is here, just in time for the Holidays! This release includes:

- The new Sugar Detox Meal Plan helps you cut back on sugar while reaching your health and weight loss goals.

- The Paleo Meal Plan is finally here! Eat only whole, unprocessed food and lose weight in no time.

- Tune up! A number of bugs have been discovered and squashed, including an issue where users with two activity trackers could have double counted exercise calories, adding back support for users using Voice Over and a few small UI issues.

Questions or feedback? Feel free to reach out to contact@lifesum.com

Happy Tracking!
Lifesum

A fresh version of Lifesum is here, just in time for the Holidays! This release includes:

- The new Sugar Detox Meal Plan helps you cut back on sugar while reaching your health and weight loss goals.

- The Paleo Meal Plan is finally here! Eat only whole, unprocessed food and lose weight in no time.

- Tune up! A number of bugs have been discovered and squashed, including an issue where users with two activity trackers could have double counted exercise calories, adding back support for users using Voice Over and a few small UI issues.

Questions or feedback? Feel free to reach out to contact@lifesum.com

Happy Tracking!

We all need a little self-care sometimes, and Lifesum is no exception. A few bug fixes later, and we’re feeling pretty fresh.

We spruced up the app to make Lifesum even easier, tastier, and more fun to use.
This version includes (drumroll, please):
- Track water and recipes with Siri.

We all need a little self-care sometimes, and Lifesum is no exception. A few bug fixes later, and we’re feeling pretty fresh.
We fixed a few things to make Lifesum even more fun to use.

Tracking your meals has never been easier!
- There are fewer steps to track your meals making it easier and more convenient for daily tracking.
- Creating and tracking your Favorites are now key features and simple to use.
- The barcode scanner is moved front and center, encouraging you to use your camera for tracking.
- Creating your own meals, recipes, and food items are now easily accessible from the tracking view.

Lifesum provides personalized feedback based on what you eat and drink, as well as your physical activity, guiding you towards a healthier lifestyle.

Your nutritional information is now at a quick glance and at your fingertips to help you stay on track!
• See your calories, macros, and exercises in a simple view.
• Track water with a single tap or with Siri.
• The Exercise dashboard highlights how your workouts and steps burn calories.
• Celebratory messages congratulate you when the goal is achieved!

The Lifesum watch app works as an independent watch app and in combination with the Lifesum phone app.

With the watch app, you can:
• Sign up for a Lifesum account.
• Use only the watch app (without having the phone app installed).
• Freely track water with the watch app.
• Mirror the unit system from the phone app to the watch app.
• View remaining calories based on your burned calories preference.
• Sign in with either Apple ID or email.
• Get the steps and Exercise goals from Apple Health on your exercise dashboard.

The Lifesum watch app is FREE.
Stay on top of your nutrition and psychical activities!

We spruced up the app to make Lifesum even easier, tastier, and more fun to use. In this version, we made the following changes:
- An annoying UI issue where the list of recent foods would jump to the top after tracking has been fixed
- A small number of users experienced crashes in the recipe tabs, these have been solved
- Error message text has been updated and aligned to increase clarity

We all need a little self-care sometimes, and Lifesum is no exception. A few bug fixes later, and we’re feeling pretty fresh.
The following issues have been found and fixed:
- An annoying UI issue in the diary after tracking.
- A bug where the wrong data was shown after changing calorie goal.
- A few minor crashes in the food tracking flow.

We spruced up the app to make Lifesum even easier, tastier, and more fun to use.
This version includes (drumroll, please):
Some major improvements to the barcode scanner that we hope you'll like!
• We've included the option to enable the camera flash when the lighting is too dark for scanning.
• If the scanner or the camera flash doesn't work we've also added the option to manually enter the digits for a barcode.
We made it easier to reach the Customer Service team in Settings -> Support - no need to read through the FAQ’s anymore!
A small UI bug for users tracking from recent list has been solved

This version includes:
- We fixed the pesky bug that stopped you from saving changes in the "edit food feature."
